svg.title: Oxygen Gauge (VU style, corrected)
svg.desc: Square retro VU-style oxygen gauge with functional needle pivoting around fixed point.

text.tspan: The SVG Presentation Maker converts markdown files into
interactive SVG-based presentations that run directly in
No complex setup. No dependencies. Just markdown and SVGs.
- Embed and display SVG images in
- Runs entirely in the browser, no
3. Reference SVG files with the image syntax
Use the standard image tag to include SVG graphics:
• Position and size your images with x, y, width, and height
• SVG files will be integrated, PNG and JPG files will be
• File must be in the folder path in the image tag in
Simple keyboard controls for smooth presentations
Keep your markdown and SVG files in the files directory
- Single SVG file can contain text and SVGs

3. Experiment with different layouts and SVG graphics.

• Any presentation where you want full control
This tool is open source and free to use.
Modify it, extend it, make it your own.
